00021 // provide testCase, name
00022 TEST(BasicTests, RandomUniformBasic) {
00023 
00024     // Output outputModel;
00025 
00026     boost::shared_ptr<Output> outputModel(new Output(44100, 8));
00027 
00028     RandomUniform a(outputModel); 
00029 
00030     // EXPECT_EQ(a.getName(), "RandomUniform");
00031 
00032 
00033     // these names are simply numerical codes for reference
00034     EXPECT_EQ(a.parameterNameMinimum,  0);
00035     EXPECT_EQ(a.parameterNameMaximum,  1);
00036 
00037 
00038     //Constant *gen1 = new Constant(outputModel); // create a constant generator
00039     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen1(new Constant(outputModel));
00040     gen1->setParameter(gen1->parameterNameValue, 0.0);
00041 
00042     //Constant *gen2 = new Constant(outputModel); // create a constant generator
00043     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen2(new Constant(outputModel));
00044     gen2->setParameter(gen2->parameterNameValue, 2.0);
00045 
00046     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getValueAtSecond(0.0), 2);
00047 
00048 
00049     // set constants to min and max
00050     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameMinimum, gen1);
00051     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameMaximum, gen2);
00052 
00053 
00054     // std::cout << "error happens next: " << std::endl;
00055     EXPECT_EQ(a.parameterMinimum->getName(), "Constant");
00056     EXPECT_EQ(a.parameterMaximum->getName(), "Constant");
00057 
00058     // test getting the value of an embedded generator
00059     EXPECT_EQ(a.parameterMaximum->getValueAtSecond(0.0), 2);
00060 
00061 
00062     EXPECT_TRUE(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0) >= 0.0);
00063     EXPECT_TRUE(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0) <= 1.0);
00064 
00065     a.printSample(10, 0); // display 10 sample outputs, b/n 0 and 1
00066     a.printSample(10, 0); // display 10 sample outputs, b/n 0 and 1
00067 
00068     float b = a.getValueAtSecond(0.0);
00069     float c = a.getValueAtSecond(0.0);
00070     float d = a.getValueAtSecond(0.0);
00071 
00072     EXPECT_TRUE(b != c);
00073     EXPECT_TRUE(c != d);
00074 
00075 
00076 
00077 }

00081 TEST(BasicTests, RandomUniformBlock) {
00082 
00083     //Output outputModel;
00084     boost::shared_ptr<Output> outputModel(new Output(44100, 8));
00085 
00086     RandomUniform a(outputModel); 
00087 
00088     // our test size is 8
00089     double outputSamples[8]; 
00090 
00091     //Constant *gen1 = new Constant(outputModel); // create a constant generator
00092     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen1(new Constant(outputModel));
00093     gen1->setParameter(gen1->parameterNameValue, 5.0);
00094 
00095 
00096     //Constant *gen2 = new Constant(outputModel); // create a constant generator
00097     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen2(new Constant(outputModel));
00098     gen2->setParameter(gen2->parameterNameValue, 8.0);
00099 
00100     // set constants to min and max
00101     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameMinimum, gen1);
00102     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameMaximum, gen2);
00103 
00104 
00105     a.getBlock(0, outputSamples);
00106     printArray(outputSamples, 8);
00107 
00108 }
